thread.title: NEU/RICHARD EDWARD
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 7000+ reviewed by NEU/RICHARD EDWARD

author: NEU/RICHARD EDWARD
title: NEU/RICHARD EDWARD
text: ASAP saved me quite a bit of money over travel sites and the airline site. It was necessary to exchange several phone calls to take care of this and every one of them was polite, competent, enjoyable. ASAP was having some computer glitches, but got the job done.
